rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An integrated open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. Compact design, energy-efficient layout and local building norms observed. Vastu principles applied for placement of stove (south-east) to avoid fire hazards.

rooms.name: Guest room
rooms.description: A modest guest bedroom with basic amenities, placed in north-west corner for positive energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Private gym
rooms.description: Dedicated fitness area with minimalistic equipment layout. Locally sourced materials used to keep costs low; designed adjacent to the living area for easy access.
